full_text:
Gosu Templates

Lesson
objectives

Use Gosu Templates to extract data for any type
of text format

| Gosu Template Gi

au .
(publicID),(bankName) publicID,ab:68
ab:68,FastCash — G& —> bankName,FastCash

Gosu
Template

« AGosu Template generates dynamic, formatted text, based on input parameters
« Always evaluates to a string

« Accepts any number of input parameters

¢ Evaluates parameters and derived values into text

¢ Supports scriptlet syntax for API calls and control of flow

| Steps to create a Gosu Template Gi

* To create a new Gosu Template: See

Gosu Program [Ei New Gosu Template x
¢ Right-click the parent package © eet —> Name: |BankAccountDataTemplate
+ Select New > Gosu Template @ GxModa : OK] {Cancel

+ Provide a name for the template See Soviet

+ <entity/description>Template

¢ All Gosu Template files have a .gst extension

@® BankAccountDataTemplate.gst |

a <#@ params(contactID : String, aBankAccount : BankAccount) #>
contact, ${contact1D}
bankName , ${aBankAccount .BankName}

4 routingNumber, ${aBankAccount.RoutingNumber}

5 accountNumber, ${aBankAccount .AccountNumber}
accountType, ${aBankAccount .AccountType}
<# if (aBankAccount.AccountType == BankAccountType.TC_SAVINGS) { &>
ageOfMessage ,<@¢ageOfMessageInSecondsté>

3 <t) &>

| Gosu Template syntax: parameters Gi

@ BankAccountDataTemplate.gst

bankName , ${aBankAccount.BankName}
routingNumber , ${aBankAccount.RoutingNumber}
accountNumber , ${aBankAccount.AccountNumber}
accountType ,${aBankAccount.AccountType}
7 <8 if (aBankAccount.AccountType == BankAccountType.TC_ SAVINGS) { &>
8 ageOfMessage ,<@@ageOfMessageInSeconds@é@>
<% } &>

¢ Input parameter declaration syntax
* <%@ params ( paraml : type, param2 : type, ..) %>

¢ White space and line breaks are rendered in the Gosu Templates

| Gosu Template syntax: expressions Gi

@ BankAccountDataTemplate.gst |
: String, aBankAccount : BankAccount) %>

3 5 BankAccount . BankName}
4 routingitumber, ${aBankAccount.RoutingNumber}
5 accountNumber , ${aBankAccount.AccountNumber}
accountType , ${aBankAccount .AccountType}
<® if (aBankAccount.AccountType == BankAccountType. TC SAVINGS) { %>
ageOfMessage ,<@@ageOfMessageInSecondst@@>
<t } >

* Template expression syntax
* ${param1} orf <%= paraml %>
* Static text is outside of a template expression, template parameter, or template
scriptlet
* contact, is treated as static text
¢ For example, if contactID is ab:5, this renders as contact,ab:5

| Gosu Template syntax: scriptlets Gi

@ BankAccountDataTemplate.gst |

1 <8@ params(contactID : String, aBankAccount : BankAccount) %>
2 contact ,${contactID}
3 bankName , ${aBankAccount.BankName}
routingNumber , ${aBankAccount.RoutingNumber}
accountNumber , ${aBankAccount.AccountNumber}
accountType , ${aBankAccount .AccountType}

¢ Evaluate scriptlet syntax
* <% if (something=true) { %> .. <% } %>

¢ Text within <% and %> compiled and evaluated as Gosu code at run-time

* Scoped within scriptlet tags, e.g. conditional logic, variable assignments, loops,
etc.

| Generating String output using Gosu Template Gi

contact, ab:9
bankliane, ACME Credit Union
uses gw.api.database.Query routinglfumber, 123-999
; accountiiunber, 112233468
uses gw.api.database.Relop cceounstype, checking
uses trainingapp.messaging. bank. BankAccountDataTemplate
banidiane, ACME Credit Union

var queryOb} = Query.make(ABPerson) routinglfumber, 225-999
queryOb}. compare (ABPerson#PublicID, Relop.Zquals, "ab:98") accountiiumber, 554433221
accountType, savings

var targetPerson = queryObj. select () .AtMostOneRow See ee seas omiessayeraseconde>

for(bankAccount in targetPerson.BankAccounts) {
=> 10 var payload = BankAccountDataTemplate. renderToString(targetPerson.PublicID, bankAccount)
print (payload)
12 }
Syntax: var payload = TemplateName. renderToString (paramList)
* TemplateName: the Gosu Template class name

* TemplateName.renderToString(paramList): returns a serialized string

| Deploy code changes Gi

New Gosu Template Modified Gosu Template

| Demonstration G

Output a String payload

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question G

_— — |dentify if each statement about Gosu Templates is True or False.

4
, A
B
Cc

It can take any number of input values.

It can make use of conditional statements and for loops.

wv

It can include values from both the object that triggered the message event and
objects related to the triggering object.

D

z=

It can be used only for message payload generation.

Se Soe Se sees esse ese

Answer

_— — |dentify if each statement about Gosu Templates is True or False.

Y
, A
B
Cc

were

D

z=

Cc

ww

Soo eS oe ese Sse ese

D)

It can take any number of input values.
It can make use of conditional statements and for loops.

It can include values from both the object that triggered the message event and
objects related to the triggering object.

It can be used only for message payload generation.
True
True

True - Gosu Templates can do this either by having the related objects passed to it
or by having the triggering object passed to it and using its foreign keys to
navigate to the related objects

False

objectives Use Gosu Templates to extract data for any type
revi eW of text format

| Student exercise

Generate a String message payload
